SA20bsu060_u:3_1: asti karma alpāyuḥsaṃvartanīyamiti karmagatiryathānyāyaṃ vistareṇa vibhaktāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:3_3: daśa vaiśāradyānīti / sarve kāmaguṇā yathānyāyaṃ yuktāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:3_5: kathaṃ daśānuśaṃsāḥ? nanu bhagavatā sūtramuktamekottarike - yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā,
SA20bsu060_u:3_6: tathāgatasteṣāṃ sattvānāmagrata ākhyāyate yadidamarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti vistaraḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:5_1: evametadyathāsūtramuktam, tathaiva tannānyathā / ye buddhe śraddadhanti, dharme cāpi, saṃghe ca pratipannāḥ, teṣāmacintyaprasannasya vipāko 'pyacintyaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:5_3: yathā - buddhasya parinirvṛtasya stūpe dattasya phalaṃ kutaḥ? yasmānnāsti pratigrāha iti,
SA20bsu060_u:5_7: api ca sarve 'pi guṇā eteṣvevāntargatāḥ ucyante /
SA20bsu060_u:5_8: kathaṃ punarbhagavati kṛtaḥ prasādo 'cintya iti? ucyate /
SA20bsu060_u:5_10: evamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu / api tu mandabuddhīnāmarthāya punaruktaṃ kriyate /
SA20bsu060_u:7_0: idaṃ aśraddhānīyam / evamacintyo vipākaḥ / tathā aśokaprabhṛtīnāṃ pāṃśudānena cakravartirājyaṃ srotāpattiphalaṃ (ca) idamacintyamaśraddheyaṃ ca /
SA20bsu060_u:7_1: tathā ca aniruddhaprabhṛtīnāṃ caikapiṇḍapātapradānena cakravartirājyaṃ sapta devarājyāni paścime ca bhave 'rhattvaṃ ca prāptam /
SA20bsu060_u:7_4: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā abhidharme bālakāṇḍasūtre - ekacittaprasādasya vipāko varṇitaḥ - yadi ānanda saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ ekacittaprasādasya vipākena saptakṛtvaḥ paranirmitavaśavartiṣu (KVU,
SA20bsu060_u:7_6: saptakṛtvo nirmāṇaratiṣu / saptakṛtvaḥ sukhiteṣu / saptakṛtvo yāmeṣu deveṣu bhūtvā rājyaṃ kārayati /
SA20bsu060_u:7_10: yadi na rājyaṃ tata idamekacittaprasādasya phalam /
SA20bsu060_u:7_12: yathā dīpaṃkareṇa buddhena dīpamālāyāḥ pradānena buddhatvaṃ prāptam /
SA20bsu060_u:7_14: evaṃrūpāṇi karmāṇi, yāni loke na praśraddadhati /
SA20bsu060_u:7_16: vistaraḥ / guṇapūrṇānāṃ tu buddhamāhātmyaṃ na kevalamagratāsūtre /
SA20bsu060_u:7_17: uktaṃ ca yathā brāhmaṇasūtre - agro 'haṃ hi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭho loke /
SA20bsu060_u:7_18: iti sūtraṃ yojyam / yathā ca bhagavān koṭusya maharṣeḥ śelasya ca tāpasasya vinayārthamāśramaṃ gataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:8_1: rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham //
SA20bsu060_u:9_0: etaddarśayati bhagavān / yathā sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ jāyamānānāmagnihotraṃ mukham /
SA20bsu060_u:9_1: vedānāṃ gāyatrī mukham / sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ rājā mukham /
SA20bsu060_u:9_2: nadīnāṃ sāgaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ / nakṣatrāṇāṃ candramā agryaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_8: yathā ca bhagavatā etadagre dakṣiṇāvibhaṅge sūtra uktam - etadagramānanda pratipudgalikānāṃ dakṣiṇīyānāṃ yadidaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_10: yathā ca mahāsamājīye parinirvāṇādisūtreṣu dvādaśayojaniko devānāṃ saṃnipātaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_12: mahāprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā anekāni tīrthakaraśatāni pravrajitāni /
SA20bsu060_u:9_19: te 'bhiprasannā bhagavati / anenāpi kāraṇena bhagavān agryaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_20: api ca yathaikottarikāgratāsūtra uktam - agradharmasamanvāgato devabhūtamanuṣyāgryaḥ prāptaḥ pramoditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_22: tenaḥ kāraṇenāgryaḥ / kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaṃ devā upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_23: yathā govindasūtre, śatavarge ca tāpasasūtre indra upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_26: tenāgryaḥ / evamapi deśitā dharmāḥ / kecidāhuḥ - (KVU, Vaidya 214) buddhaḥ parinirvṛto mokṣaṃ prāptaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_27: tasya yat stūpe dattaṃ pratimāyāṃ vā dhūpapuṣpādikaṃ kaḥ pratigṛhṇātiḥ? yadā buddhaḥ parinirvṛta evocyate /
SA20bsu060_u:9_28: aśraddhaitadvākyam, purato vā pāpataram, yeṣāṃ buddhaśāsanasiddhānto na viditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_30: / sa cādya tiṣṭhati / tasminnantarhite buddhaḥ parinirvṛto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsu060_u:9_32: kiṃ kāraṇam? dharmaśarīraṃ bhagavataḥ śarīraṃ pāramārthikam /
SA20bsu060_u:9_33: tena dharmeṇa yadā deśitena srotāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyate,
SA20bsu060_u:9_37: na parinirvṛtaḥ / tatrāyaṃ doṣaḥ syāt / asmākaṃ tvadyāpi phalāni prāpsyante /
SA20bsu060_u:9_38: na parinirvṛtaḥ / tatrāyaṃ doṣaḥ syāt / asmākaṃ tvadyāpi phalāni prāpyante /
SA20bsu060_u:9_42: yathā mahāparinirvāṇasūtre uktam - syādevamānanda yuṣmākaṃ parinirvṛto bhagavān /
SA20bsu060_u:9_43: adyāgre nāsti śāsteti / naitadevaṃ draṣṭavyam / adyāgre vaḥ ānanda sūtrāntaḥ śāstā /
SA20bsu060_u:9_45: adyāgre caiṣa buddhaḥ / etaddarśayati / bhagavān / tathā na kiṃcinmātāpitṛsaṃbhavena śarīreṇa kāryaṃ kriyate /
SA20bsu060_u:9_46: etaddarśayati / yadāhaṃ gṛha āvāsavasitaḥ, na tadā mayā kaściddharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_49: ye duḥkhena dharmamicchanti te duṣkaracaryayā vismāpitāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_52: tathā pratyavagantavyāḥ / ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ kṛtam / na ca tena kaściddharmo 'dhigataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_53: paścānmayā bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ śarīrabalaṃ ca prāpya vaiśākhamāsapūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ bodhimūle niṣaṇṇenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptā /
SA20bsu060_u:9_56: sa cā - - - - ti / anenāpi kāraṇena dharmakāyāstathāgatāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_57: yathā vinaye pāṭhaḥ / bhagavantaṃ bhagavato mātṛṣvasāha - jīvantu bhavanta bhaga - - - - - - /
SA20bsu060_u:9_58: yattu bhagavatoktam - - - - na te 'haṃ gautami pureva vaktavyaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_59: sāha - atha kathaṃ bhagavān vaktavyaḥ? bhagavānāha - evaṃ vaktavyam - dī(rgharātraṃ bhagava)to dharmastiṣṭhatu /
SA20bsu060_u:9_60: etaddarśayati - na mama mātāpitṛsaṃbhavena śarīreṇa kiṃcinniṣṭhā /
SA20bsu060_u:9_62: tiṣṭhatu / yāni mayā saṃsāre duṣkarasahasrāṇi kṛtāni,
SA20bsu060_u:9_63: tānyatīva dharmasyārthāya / anenāpi kāraṇena ya eva bhagavataḥ śarīraṃ - - - /
SA20bsu060_u:9_67: divyāni - - - - - - nanda evaṃ tathāgataḥ satkṛto bhavati gurukṛto mānito vā pūjito vā /
SA20bsu060_u:9_68: yaḥ punaḥ kaścidānanda mama śāsane 'pramatto viharati,
SA20bsu060_u:9_70: tenāhaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhavāmi /
SA20bsu060_u:9_72: (taṃ ca) śarīrapūjā kṛtā, na dharmo dhāritaḥ / yāvaddharmo 'ntarhitaḥ / evamāpūryamapyevaṃ kari - - - - - - - (apa)cayitavyaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_73: etanmama śarīram / etaddarśayati - (KVU, Vaidya 215) mayi parinirvṛte yatkartavyam /
SA20bsu060_u:9_75: dharmakāyāsta(thāgatāḥ) / mahāparinivāṇe āryānandaḥ pṛcchati - kathamasmābhirbhagavati parinirvṛte bhagavaccharīrapratipattiḥ kāryā? bhagavānāha - alpotsukairyuṣmābhirbhavitavyam /
SA20bsu060_u:9_81: yathā ca devāvatārasūtre utpalavarṇābhikṣuṇyā cakravartirūpaṃ nirmāya bhagavān devalokāvatīrṇaḥ prathamaṃ vanditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_82: sā tuṣṭā / mayā bhagavān prathamaṃ vanditaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:9_84: etaddarśayati - na mātāpitṛsaṃbhavena śarīreṇa varṇitena vandito bhavāmi /
SA20bsu060_u:11_0: anenāpi kāraṇena dharma eva bhagavataḥ śarīram /
SA20bsu060_u:11_2: atha paścimeṣu janapadeṣu dvau bhikṣū prativasataḥ sakhāyau /
SA20bsu060_u:11_4: mahāṭavyāṃ prapannau / tṛṣārtābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ pānīyaṃ prāptam /
SA20bsu060_u:11_5: ekena tṛṣitena pītam / dvitīya āha - nāhaṃ bhagavataḥ śikṣāmatikramiṣyāmi /
SA20bsu060_u:11_11: dvitīyo bhikṣuḥ sapramāṇakaṃ pānīyaṃ pītvā anupūrveṇa bahubhirdivasairbhagavataḥ samīpaṃ gataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:11_12: sa ca deveṣūpapanno bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ gataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:11_13: yena saprāṇakaṃ pānīyaṃ pītaḥ tasya bhikṣorbhagavatā mātāpitṛsaḥbhavaḥ śarīraḥ darśitam - etanmama śarīraḥ paśya /
SA20bsu060_u:11_14: sa ca devalokopapanno bhikṣurbhagavatoktaḥ - darśaya śarīraḥ te /
SA20bsu060_u:11_17: kimidam? bhagavānāha - ya eṣa devaputro 'nena tṛṣṇārtena saprāṇakamudakaḥ na pītam /
SA20bsu060_u:11_19: eṣa dvitīyo mātāpitṛsaḥbhavaḥ śarīraḥ draṣṭukāmaḥ sapraṇākaḥ pānīyaḥ pītvā etasya mayā mātāpitṛsaḥbhavaḥ śarīraḥ darśitam - etaccharīraḥ paśya /
SA20bsu060_u:12_1: aparādhena tiṣṭhanti na te buddhasya sāntike //
SA20bsu060_u:12_2: yojanānāṃ sahasreṣu ye śrutvā na subhāṣitam /
SA20bsu060_u:12_3: tadarthaṃ pratipadyanti te vai buddhasya sāntike //
SA20bsu060_u:13_0: yathā ca bhagavān dharmaprītyarthaṃ nandakasya bhikṣādharmaśrāvaṇāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:13_5: taṃ mārgayata / na mātāpitṛsaṃbhavasya (KVU, Vaidya 216) śarīrasya upasthāpakaṃ mārgayata /
SA20bsu060_u:13_6: kiṃ kāraṇam? yathoktaṃ ṛddhipādanipāte mṛgāramātuḥ prāsāde - evaṃ bhāviteṣu bhikṣavastathāgataścaturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā /
SA20bsu060_u:13_7: etaddarśayati - na yūyaṃ samarthā mama śarīraṃ kalpaṃ vā dhārayitum /
SA20bsu060_u:13_9: etanmama śarīram / yathā ca mahādevasūtre uktam - mā mama bhaviṣyatha paścima - - - - /
SA20bsu060_u:13_11: mahāprajñānāṃ sāriputraḥ / ṛddhimatāṃ maudgalyāyanaḥ / yāvaddakṣiṇeyānāṃ subhūtiḥ kulaputraḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_0: bhikṣavaḥ / vyakto vinītaḥ viśāradaḥ / bahuśrutaḥ / dharmakathikaḥ / dharmārthapratipannaḥ saṃghaṃ śobhayati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_1: bhikṣuṇī / upāsakaḥ / upāsikā / bhikṣavaḥ / vyaktā vinītā viśāradā bahuśrutā dhārmikā dharmārthapratipannāḥ saṃghaṃ śobhayanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_2: tadapi sūtraṃ vaktavyam / api ca / ekapudgale 'pi tāvacca asmākaṃ vītarāge 'prameyā dakṣiṇā /
SA20bsu060_u:14_3: yathoktamugrasūtre - paśyogra bhikṣuḥ cīvareṇa prāvṛtenāpramāṇaṃ samādhimupasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_7: tadyathogra gṛhapate saṃbahulā mahānadya ekībhāvaṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_9: atha ca punaraprameyo 'saṃkhyeyo mahānudakaskandhaḥ iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_10: katamā mahānadyaḥ? gaṅgā yamunā sarayū āryavatī mahī /
SA20bsu060_u:14_12: atha ca punaraprameyo 'saṃkhyeyo mahānudakaskandhaḥ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_13: evamevogra paśya bhikṣuḥ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjannapramāṇaṃ samādhimupasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_16: evameva pudgale 'pi tāvacchīlavati asmākaṃ dattamaprameyaphalaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_19: tathā parinirvṛtasya bhagavataḥ stūpe kṛtāyāḥ pūjāyā aprameyo vipākaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_22: sa mahābhogavattāṃ vā prārthayan dānaṃ dadāti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_23: svargasukhaṃ vā cintayan, mokṣanimittaṃ vā / tacca sarvamuktam - yathā mahābhogaśca bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_24: svargeṣūpapadyate / kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti / evamaprameyaḥ stūpe kṛtādhikārasya vipākaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_26: asti karma asmākaṃ yaḥ stūpe dattamapaharati,
SA20bsu060_u:14_27: tasyāparimāṇaṃ pāpam / teṣāmupamānaṃ na teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ kriyate /
SA20bsu060_u:14_29: vastrālaṃkārādiḥ, tasya sarvasya yaḥ kaścidapahāraṃ karoti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_31: eṣo 'smākaṃ siddhāntaḥ - yatstūpe dattaṃ tatstūpe eva yojyam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_32: yatsaṃghe, tatsaṃghe evopayojyam / eṣa svasiddhāntaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_35: kathaṃ punarbāhyā ye devāsteṣāṃ datte kiṃ puṇyaṃ phalate? (KVU,
SA20bsu060_u:14_37: buddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ / asmākaṃ devāstiṣṭhanti / evaṃ ca brūmaḥ - yastiṣṭhati yadeva bhaktā vā dhūpaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā vastraṃ vā alaṃkāraṃ vā hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā prayacchanti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_38: kimayaṃ hastena hastaṃ na pratigṛhṇāti? atha na pratigṛhṇāti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_39: buddhasya teṣāṃ ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ? atha matam - devānāṃ vā arcāsteṣāṃ pratikṛtayaḥ pūjyante /
SA20bsu060_u:14_41: guṇāśca pūjyante / pratimāsu ye dhūpaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ pratiyacchanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_43: pūjyante / yasmānna pratigṛhṇāti, tasmānnāsti devāḥ / athāsti devāḥ, kasmānna pratigṛhṇanti? kiṃ kāraṇam? uktaṃ bhagavatā - trayāṇāṃ samavāyena dakṣiṇā mahāphalā bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_44: yadi tāvaddātā bhavati, yacca dravyaṃ dātavyaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇādi tacca bhavati,
SA20bsu060_u:14_45: ye dakṣiṇīyāḥ / pratigrāhakāḥ devā manuṣyā vā /
SA20bsu060_u:14_47: na dānapratidānaṃ hastena hastaṃ dattaṃ mahāphalaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_48: yadyastyeva, kiṃ ca na pratigṛhṇanti? tadbhaktānām /
SA20bsu060_u:14_49: atha pratigṛhṇanti, tadbhaktānām / atha na pratigṛhṇanti, kiṃ kṛtvā? atha yuktaṃ ca bhaktānāmevaṃ krodhaḥ kāraṇam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_50: atha teṣāṃ satyaṃ nāsmākaṃ devaḥ kruddha iti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_51: ucyate / yadi na kruddhāḥ, kimarthaṃ na pratigṛhṇanti? tasmānnāsti saḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_52: idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam / yacca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devabhaktāḥ suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā pādamūle prayacchanti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_53: evaṃ devasya ko bandho vā iti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_54: tadyadi tasya dhūpeṣu puṣpeṣu gandheṣu vā mālyakare vopayujyate /
SA20bsu060_u:14_58: ye ca gṛhṇanti vayaṃ devabhaktā devapādopajīvinaḥ
SA20bsu060_u:14_59: / devo vayaṃ caikamiti / teṣāmadattadevaiśvarye devadravyāpahāre kiṃ kāraṇam? devadravyamanyena grāhyam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_60: iha devasya samo vā dravyaṃ gṛhyet prativiśiṣṭo vā? na ca devasya kaścittulyaḥ,
SA20bsu060_u:14_61: prāgeva viśiṣṭataraśca / te prativiśiṣṭatarāḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmātte tasya praṇipātaṃ kurvanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_62: devapāde ca svapanti / yadā te viśiṣṭatarāḥ, kimarthaṃ devaḥ prasādyate? atha tatra devadravyagrahaṇe pāpaṃ nāsti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_65: teṣāmapi pāpaṃ nāsti / atha mātā pitā putro rājā bhṛtyaḥca yathādravyaṃ yathāpaitryaṃ dravyaṃ putro gṛhṇāti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_67: tathā vayamapi / evamapyayuktam / kiṃ kāraṇam? putrasya tu piturdravyaṃ gṛhṇato mahān pātakaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_69: ucyate / rājā adattānāṃ gṛhṇamāṇaṃ putraṃ ca piotā ca dadyāt pitā,
SA20bsu060_u:14_72: tasmādgṛhṇīma iti / taccāyuktam / kiṃ kāraṇam? na ca devabhaktāste devadravyaṃ gṛhṇanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_73: atha gṛhṇanti, na te tadbhaktā bhavanti / na kaścidbhaktimān devadravyaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_75: devadravye teṣāṃ bhaktiḥ / na teṣāṃ kiṃcitpāpaṃ na vidyate,
SA20bsu060_u:14_76: ye 'dattaṃ gṛhṇanti / kiṃ kāraṇam? pūrvarṣibhirmūle chinne tapovṛkṣaśākhāyāṃ yasya luptapitṛsnehastasyetaro janaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_78: na tasya kiṃcidakaraṇīyam / kiṃ kāraṇam? (KVU, Vaidya 218) na te bhaktimantaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_79: atha te bhaktimantaḥ, śatravaḥ ke khyāpitā devasya? atha matam - yathā amamāstena teṣāṃ dravyaṃ na prayojanam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_80: ucyate / asti keṣāṃciddevānāṃ śrutiryathā devayajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ pṛthivyā apahāraśca kṛta iti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_81: kasmātte 'mamā na bhavanti? asmādasmākameva dattaṃ na devasya /
SA20bsu060_u:14_83: yasmādutsṛjya devasya, tasmānna yuṣmākaṃ dattam / atha matam - devasyaiva tuṣṭiryadvayaṃ gṛhvīmaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_84: kimarthaṃ devena sa dātā noktaḥ - eṣāṃ prayaccha,
SA20bsu060_u:14_86: yasmāddātā devena noktaḥ, taiśca gṛhītam, tasmāddātuḥ puṇyaphalaṃ nāsti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_88: / atha matam - devasya puṇye ca - - - - taccāyuktam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_89: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāddevena tad dravyaṃ svayameva gṛhya hastena hastaṃ teṣāṃ na pratipāditam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_90: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā - trayāṇāṃ samavāyena dakṣiṇā mahāphalā bhavatyeveti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_91: evaṃ kiṃ na dattam? evaṃ caite viśiṣṭāḥ samānādeva /
SA20bsu060_u:14_95: kecidrājādattabhayāt / etāni devānāṃ ca devabhaktānāṃ ca devadharmasya pa - - - - - kāni /
SA20bsu060_u:14_96: adyāpi cātra bhūtaṃ vaktavyametattāvaddevasya tīrthayātramapi teṣāṃ kaḥ pratigṛhṇati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_97: tāsāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca kūlāni viśālāni pā - - - - kālagatāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_98: yattīrtheṣu śrāvayanti kastīrthayātrāṃ teṣāṃ pratigṛhṇāti? atha matam - nadyāṃ snāyāmastīrthamuddiśya asyā nadyāstasmāttīrtha - - - - - yate /
SA20bsu060_u:14_99: siddho 'smatpakṣaḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam? asmākaṃ buddhasya śarīraṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_100: guṇāḥ pūjyante / stūpāni ca dhūpaṃ puṣpaṃ pratigṛhṇanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_101: - - - - tā nadyaḥ paurāṇamārgamutsṛjya anena pṛthivīpradeśena vahanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_102: te ca ṛṣayaḥ kālagatāḥ / tasmātteṣāṃ na kaścittīrthayātrāṃ pratigṛhṇāti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_103: evaṃvidhameva ye ṛṣīṇāṃ te brahmarṣiṇāṃ pūjāprabhṛtayaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_105: brahmāsya jātiḥ / kecidākāśyapīyaṃ pūjāḥ / keṣāṃcidīśvaraḥ kartā / apare tvāhuḥ - prajāpatinā sṛṣṭāḥ prajāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_106: tasya brahmaṇo mukham / bāhustu kṣatriyāḥ / ūrubhyāṃ vaiśyāḥ / padbhyāṃ śūdrāḥ / evaṃ te saṃpratipannāḥ / vayaṃ brūmaḥ - pūrvakālato devaparīkṣitā idaṃ pāpataramaśrotavyaṃ ca /
SA20bsu060_u:14_107: kiṃ kāraṇam? ye kicana sattvā dvipadā catuṣpadā vā,
SA20bsu060_u:14_108: teṣāṃ yonimukhānnirgamaḥ / kiṃ prāptam? prajāpatiyonicatuṣṭayaṃ ca prathamataḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_110: evaṃ ca - - - - sarve mukhata eva jātāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_111: kathamekapuruṣeṇa varṇacatuṣṭayaṃ jātam? yadi ca cāturvarṇyaṃ prajāpatinā jātam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_112: ete varṇāścaṇḍālamleccha - - - - yaśca kutaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ? tathā hastigavāśvādayaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_113: kiṃ kāraṇam? eṣāmatra nāmagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_116: / atha vā kiṃ noktam / mūrdhādasurā jātāḥ hastataḥ - - - ti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_122: dvitīyaḥ kṣatriyaḥ / tṛtīyo vaiśyaḥ / caturthaḥ śūdraḥ / pañcamaścāṇḍālaḥ - - - - - tato nyūnatarāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_126: dvitīyaḥ kṣatriyaḥ / tṛtīyo vaiśyaḥ / caturthaḥ śūdraḥ / pañcamaścaṇḍālaḥ / śeṣā nyūnatarāḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam? bījasadṛśaṃ phalam /
SA20bsu060_u:14_127: yathā prajāpateścaturvarṇam, evaṃ tasya putrāṇāṃ gotrāṇāṃ ca caturvarṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsu060_u:14_131: kiṃ prayojanam? atha matam - prajāpatinā brāhmaṇā nyūnatarā iti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_133: śeṣā nyūnatarāḥ / yāvadbrahmaṇaputrī brāhmaṇī yadyasya mukhato jātā,
SA20bsu060_u:14_134: tasmādagamyā / atha padbhyāṃ jātā, śūdrā / evaṃ teṣāṃ prajāpatiparīkṣāyā aparimāṇā doṣāḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:14_137: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāduktam - brahmaṇedaṃ jagatsṛṣṭaṃ lokeśvaranirmitaṃ prajāpatikṛtaṃ ceti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_138: sa kaṃ satyaṃ bhavet / evaṃ te 'nyonyaviruddhāstīrthakarā vivadanti /
SA20bsu060_u:14_139: atha matam - sahitā bhūtvā prajā nirmiṇanti,
SA20bsu060_u:14_140: tadapyayuktam / kiṃ kāraṇam? te pratisāmantarājāno yathānyonyāhaṃkārāḥ - ahaṃ kartā,
SA20bsu060_u:15_1: aśāśvatasya cittasya te nirmāyuḥ kathaṃ prajāḥ //
SA20bsu060_u:16_0: evaṃ te sahitā bhūtvā asamarthāḥ prajānirmāṇe /
SA20bsu060_u:16_1: evaṃ teṣāṃ mātāpi / mahādoṣaḥ karmaṇā na kiṃcinmātraiva pradarśitam /
SA20bsu060_u:16_4: ucyate / adya niravakāśaṃ yasmānnāmagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
SA20bsu060_u:16_5: kiṃ kāraṇam? ekasya doṣe datte śeṣā doṣā bhavanti /
SA20bsu060_u:16_6: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yadi tava brāhmaṇārthaṃ saha kathāṃ kuryāt,
SA20bsu060_u:16_7: sa tasya doṣo dātavyaḥ / yadi kṣatriyeṇa, yadi vaiśyena, yadi śūdreṇa saha kathā kriyate,
SA20bsu060_u:16_8: yadevamāsṛtya śūdraḥ kathāṃ kuryāt saha vaktavyam /
SA20bsu060_u:16_9: tasmādayaṃ doṣaḥ ityevaṃ niravakāśaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsu060_u:16_11: kastāḥ pūjāḥ parigṛhṇātīti, teṣāmeva svasiddhāntadoṣo vaktavyaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:16_15: na caitadanarthamuktam / atraikottarikāsūtraṃ pratyavagantavyam - trīṇīmāni bhikṣavaḥ pracchannavāhīnīti /
SA20bsu060_u:16_16: katamāni trīṇi? mātṛgrāmaḥ kūṭakārṣāpaṇo brāhmaṇānāṃ siddhāntaḥ /
SA20bsu060_u:16_20: yānyetāni parīkṣākāraṇāni devapūjāprajāpatiprabhṛtīnāṃ sadā kāryamadhikṛtya bhagavatoktam - brāhmaṇānāṃ siddhāntaḥ pracchannavāhī /
SA20bsu060_u:16_22: atra vistareṇa vibhaktāni / tasmānmahākarmavibhaṅgaḥ / saṃgrahasārakarmavibhaṅgasarvasārakarmaṇāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamāni vistareṇa kathāmukhāni darśitāni /
SA20bsu060_u:18_1: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA20bsu060_u:18_2: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA20bsu060_u:21_0: yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā /
SA20bsu060_u:21_1: yadi śuddhamaśuddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na vidyate //
SA20bsu060_u:23_0: śreyo 'stu / saṃvat 531 mārgaśiromāse śuklapakṣe trayodaśyāṃ tithau /
SA20bsu060_u:24_1: yajamānaśriyaṃ brūmo yā śṛṅgāṅgalage śrīśrī ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvihāre śākyabhikṣuśrī mama likhyate /
